about_the_game: The trial version of "Ru Lin Wai Shi Fan Jin Pian " will provide the process of 1-4 chapters in the early stages of the game, accounting for about a quarter of the game's content. The trial version does not have side quests.
detailed_description: The trial version of "Ru Lin Wai Shi Fan Jin Pian " will provide the process of 1-4 chapters in the early stages of the game, accounting for about a quarter of the game's content. The trial version does not have side quests.
